<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Angelkin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1348) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You descend from an [angel](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=3)—a winged messenger from [Nirvana](/Planes.aspx?ID=20) or one of the other celestial realms—which gives you a knack for cultures and languages. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14). If you would automatically become trained in Society (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You know the [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16) language, and you gain the [Multilingual](/Feats.aspx?ID=814) skill feat.

<title level="2">Angelkin leads to...</title>
[Angelic Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1357), [Truespeech](/Feats.aspx?ID=2296)
name: Angelkin
